channel.title: [HELP] Making Npc's Speak [HELP]
channel.description:
Hello, Moparscape
I am here today, to find out how to make npc's on a deltascape server base speak
I want my shops to say like "Barrows Shop Here"
And I want three npc's that say Owner Jamie is online and Owner Tom is only and Players Online
Could you guys help me?
Thanks, Jamie

item.title: [HELP] Making Npc's Speak [HELP]

item.description:
@Jamie14 wrote:

I don’t really understand[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 04:26:44 am[/size][hr]help?

item.title: [HELP] Making Npc's Speak [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @fireflame7 fireflame7
item.description:
@fireflame7 wrote:

i can help u
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2008, 04:58:04 pm[/size][hr]ok if you have your npc spawned already go to NPChandler the look for something that a shop says like fancy shop. then copy all that. paste it under it after the last } kinda like this if (npcs[i].npcType == 2168) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Super Fancy Phase Cheep!!”;
}
} <-------- after this one k. now delete ur npc id then put it in with the npc you want to make say barrows here. then when it says fancy shop or what ever it says dlete that and put barrows here or what ever Save then compile then reopen server an there you go.

Read full topic
